description: note - also known as Arab League (AL) 22 March 1945 to promote economic, social, political, and military cooperation members - (21 plus Palestine) Algeria, Bahrain, Comoros, Djibouti, Egypt, Iraq, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Libya, Mauritania, Morocco, Oman, Palestine, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria (suspended), Tunisia, UAE, Yemen observers - (5) Armenia, Brazil, Eritrea, India, Venezuela
